entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , The Pas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: The Pas Airport 9:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
